label: Spark KMeans Example
description: The example Spark KMeans application. This example starts with a Stream of points represented by their x, y, and z coordinates. A Flow reads from the Stream and writes each point to an ObjectStore. There is then a Spark program that reads points from that ObjectStore and trains a KMeans model to divide the points into clusters. A Service is then used to take an input point and return which cluster it belongs to.
author: Cask

arguments.name: description
arguments.value: Stream of points reprented by their x,y,z coordinates

arguments.name: steps
value: Upload the jar in the next step
